title: Interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream in different situations. Defecation is considered one of the most important vital functions thanks to which a person lives a healthy and sound life. The excretion process removes waste and toxins from the body. Which can be reused in agriculture. But what does defecation mean in a dream? Is it a good or evil omen? We will learn this in the following lines from the encyclopedia in an article about the interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream. Interpretation of feces in a dream The meaning of seeing feces in a dream is to obtain everything that a person wants in his profession. If a student sees it, this means success in exams, and if a trader sees it, this means that he will make a profit in trade, etc. As for seeing excrement on mountains or highlands, this indicates the dreamer’s need to get rid of his laziness and make an effort to achieve the goal. Collecting animal excrement or dung indicates that The fortuneteller uses legal and intelligent methods to earn a living. Seeing excrement in the market is evidence of God’s wrath upon the dreamer and the concealment of the end of the world. Collecting and storing excrement is evidence that the fortuneteller has a good reputation and indicates comfort after distress and happiness after sadness for a long time. As for those who think that he He defecates and then soils his chair, in reality he is hiding a large sum of money. Walking on feces in a dream indicates that the dreamer is looking for forbidden ways. If he sees that he is defecating in an open place, this means that he is seeking to meet people’s needs. But if he sees that worms are coming out Of feces, it means that he will get rid of an unpleasant enemy, or something hateful. Also, seeing him defecating in a far away place like a valley means that he will assume power or a great position. As for eating excrement in a dream, it means earning forbidden money and using illegal methods. Playing with excrement in The dream refers to gambling and gambling in reality, while throwing feces means spreading disease and immorality. Washing feces in a dream Washing or cleaning feces from a person or clothes indicates that he can cause harm to them. It also announces many sins and sins. It may also indicate that ways will be secured. Living in the near future, but it will be accompanied by fatigue. And if he sees himself putting a chair in a pot, he will enjoy the dreamer’s life with a degree of joy and stability. But if he sees that he is washing the feces from his hand, this is his attempt to get rid of worries and problems, and a sign of repentance and a return to God. Meaning and scent Feces in a dream: The foul smell of feces in a dream indicates the pursuit of desires and desires that are contrary to Sharia law. If the fortuneteller sheds blood, this is evidence of relief from distress and the disappearance of worries. If the fortuneteller throws silver or gold, this is evidence of slaughtering a large portion of money. Green feces indicate relief after severe distress. If the stool is yellow, this indicates wisdom, intelligence, and energy. Stool in a dream for a single woman. In an unmarried woman’s vision of stool, she will soon hear good news. Stool in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates relief from distress and sadness. It can indicate relief from distress and sadness. Also, he has a great position at work. As for the unmarried woman, he wears his clothes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake in a dream

preview.html: Snakes and snakes are very hated things and symbols in a dream because there is constant hostility between people and snakes, and when they appear, they cause panic, fear, and panic in the soul of the fortuneteller, and here we will follow together the interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake in the dream with its various connotations. Follow with us these following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake. Seeing a snake or snake in a dream, regardless of its shape, color, or location, is not good at all for the dreamer and there is no good in it. A snake in a dream is a cunning enemy, and a snake can be a very hostile woman. As for the interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake, it leads to many From various interpretations. It may symbolize the suppression of rebellion, deception, or machinations planned or orchestrated by a woman and served by another woman. There are those who say that seeing a snake in a dream is a sign of power, so the interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake symbolizes the death of power and prestige. Interpretation A dream of a snake swallowing a snake could symbolize the obsession of a soul that is controlled by evil in the viewer of his behavior. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream of a snake swallowing a snake symbolizes the dreamer’s liberation from a trick, disaster, or intrigue, but falling into another, stronger and more serious one. There are those who say The interpretation of this dream leads to the dreamer’s religion being corrupted and his straying from the right path. As for the interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing someone, it is considered a good vision because it symbolizes gaining a position and prestige or an important position and responsibility. Seeing a snake swallowing a child in a dream indicates the dangers surrounding the child and his family. In fact. It can be a sign of the dreamer’s victory over his enemy through cunning, deception, and cunning. In the event of escaping from a snake in a dream, this is a sign of getting rid of sorrows and worries. See also: Seeing a snake chasing me in a dream Swallowing a snake in a dream Watching the video and seeing a snake in a dream of any At the end of the article, we explained to you in detail the interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a snake in a dream, hoping that you will like it and that we will be happy to communicate with you through comments and reactions. Send your dreams

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating figs, gooseberries, and grapes are among the fruits that many of us love for their wonderful taste. It is also one of the fruits of Paradise that God has blessed us all with. When you see them in a dream, they have many interpretations and interpretations that we can provide in our article to clarify what will return to the dreamer, whether good or bad, based on the sayings and opinions of leading scholars. The interpreters in the world of dreams are like the scholar Ibn Sirin, and the reader must continue reading to see the meaning of his dream. Interpretation of the dream of eating figs and grapes: The vision of eating figs and grapes carries connotations and signs that can be seen through the following cases: Seeing figs and grapes in a dream means happy and joyful events that will occur in The dreamer's life in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating figs and grapes, this symbolizes a lot of sustenance and abundant money that he will obtain from a source of status such as work or inheritance. Eating figs and grapes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires that the dreamer seeks Interpretation of the dream of eating figs and grapes by Ibn Sirin. One of the most prominent scholars who dealt with the interpretation of eating figs and grapes in a dream is the scholar Ibn Sirin. We present to him some interpretations: Eating figs and grapes by Ibn Sirin in a dream indicates a broad and abundant diet that the dreamer will acquire and change his life for the better. If the dreamer sees In a dream, he eats figs and grapes at an inappropriate time, as this symbolizes the difficulties and problems that he will face in his life in the coming period. Picking figs and grapes in a dream and eating them is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of the problems and obstacles that blocked his path to achieving his goals. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes For a single woman, there are many interpretations related to the symbol of eating figs and grapes in a dream, depending on the social status of the dreamer. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is eating fruits such as grapes and figs indicates that she will reach her goals and desires easily and without fatigue. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is eating figs And grapes, this symbolizes her marriage to a person with a high degree of wealth and generosity and with whom she lives a full and luxurious life. Eating figs and grapes in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will hear good news and that joys and happy occasions will come soon. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes for a married womanA married woman who She sees in her dream that her husband gives her figs and grapes and she eats them, indicating the stability of her married life, the happiness and satisfaction she enjoys with him, and the spread of an atmosphere of love and intimate relationship. In her family environment. If a married woman dreams that she is eating grapes and some figs and they taste delicious, this symbolizes the good condition of her children and that they will be fair to her. Eating figs and grapes in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will relieve her worries and sorrows and enjoy a life full of optimism and hope. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes For a pregnant woman: One of the times that a woman dreams about as a result of her psychological state is pregnancy, so we will interpret her vision of eating figs and grapes in a dream as...

title: Interpretation of a dream about beating and fighting: seeing a fight in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with wordsInterpretation of a dream of quarreling with relativesFighting in a dream for unmarried womenArgument in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of quarreling with a strangerVerbal disagreement in a dreamProblems in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of quarreling with someone you loveWhoever dreams of hitting him with a stick indicates that the killer promises something to the striker and does not fulfill his promise.It is said that hitting portends preaching and also shows change, and whoever sees that he is hitting on the eyelid wants to violate his religion, and if the dreamer sees that he is hitting himself on the head, and the result of hitting. On his head, this indicates that the priest wants his master to go, and whoever sees that he is pulling out his eye indicates his call to heresy and misguidance.And whoever sees that he hit a man in his ear or tear and blood came out, he planted the daughter of the blow, and it was said: The beating is a request, so whoever sees that he hit a man is. He prays for him, and whoever sees that he hit a man while he is folded, he has offended him.Being bitten in a dream indicates excessive love for anyone who bites, whether human or non-human.Interpretation of disputes in a dream - YouTube
preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel in words. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with relatives. A fight in a dream for unmarried women. An argument in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a stranger. Verbal disagreement in a dream. Problems in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with someone you love. Whoever dreams of hitting him with a stick indicates that the killer promises something to the striker and does not fulfill his promise. It is said that hitting is a foreshadowing. By preaching and also showing change, and whoever sees that he is hitting someone on the eyelid, he wants to violate his religion, and if the dreamer sees that he is hitting someone on the head, and the result of the hitting. On his head, this indicates that the priest wants his master to go, and whoever sees that he plucks out his eye indicates his call to heresy and misguidance. And whoever sees that he hit a man in the ear or tears, then blood comes out, sowing the daughter of the blow, and it is said: hitting is a request, so whoever sees that he hits a man He is. He prays for him, and whoever sees that he hits a man while he is folded, he has offended him. Being bitten in a dream indicates excessive love for anyone who bites, whether human or non-human. title: Interpretation of a dream about my father giving me a car in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of my father, who gave me a car in a dream. In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of the dream of my father, who gave me a car in a dream, according to what scholars said, where you can find what messages it conveys..Interpretation of the dream of my father, who gave me a car in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father giving me a car in a dream . Giving a car may indicate an authentic and ancient origin, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a gift of a car in a dream, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows all that is not seen. If a married woman sees a gift of a car, this may indicate pregnancy, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a woman sees A car carrier in a dream blowing a car, this may represent food and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my father selling his car in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father selling his car in a dream. To see a car sold at a cheap price could indicate crises and fears, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the car being sold at a cheap price, it may lead to... To losses, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman selling a car in a dream, this may indicate positive thinking, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a car for sale in a dream may indicate criticism to which you are exposed, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father kissing me on the cheek. The cheek in a dream of seeing children kissing can indicate bonding, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the father kissing the children, this may lead to their bonding, and God knows best. When a married man sees the father kissing his hand, this may be a sign of the father’s need for his children, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see An unmarried girl whose father kisses her in a dream, as this may represent a bond, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father smiling at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father smiling at me in a dream could be a sign of happy news, and God knows best. If a married man sees his father smiling in a dream, this may indicate Goodness and happiness, God willing. When a single girl sees her father smiling, she can lead a good journey that she will enjoy, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a father smiling at her in a dream, this may represent good morals and conduct, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father The deceased hitting me in a dream can refer to warning the son against committing sins, and God knows everything. In case the dreamer sees the deceased father hitting him, he can warn the son against doing wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father hitting her in a dream, this may mean that he warns Of sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a dead father hitting her in a dream, this may represent a warning to the woman against committing wrong actions, and God knows everything that he did not see. Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting me in a dream Interpretation of a dream where my father hits me in a dream can express affection and God The unseen knows: If an unmarried girl sees her father beating her, and the beating is painful, it may be an indication of matters in her region that her father does not approve of, and God knows all that

title: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married, pregnant, or single woman

preview.html:
I like it FansSubscribedFans Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman. Eggs are one of the most common things that a sleeper sees and they can bring good news and some very bad news. Here are other interpretations by scholars and experts in dream interpretation. We present to you the interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dreamEggs are one of the things that many people dream about, and here are the most important interpretations of seeing eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees herself Carrying eggs from one place to another or taking them as gifts, this is a sign of many good things that a married woman will soon receive.
If a woman mariée voit qu'elle de coquilles d'ufs, this signifie une mauvaise chose, c'est-àdire qu'elle medisise sur quelqu'un, en partulier sur les morts, et c'est une très bad thing. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees many beautiful colors of eggs in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a girl. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is eating eggs, this is evidence that the baby will be a boy and that it will be accompanied by an abundance of goodness. But if the pregnant woman sees that the egg has broken from her hand, then this It means that she may lose her fetus. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is losing or breaking eggs in her hands, this means that she is at risk of losing her current husband or the one who proposed marriage to her before. But if she sees that she is offering them and eating them in quantities Big, this means that most of her children are boys, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that she is eating eggs, this is a good sign and means that she will have a very good husband or children, and perhaps hope. Interpretation of seeing fried and boiled eggs in a dream: Firstly, it usually means scrambled eggs or Fried eggs in a dream represent an active girl who cares about the affairs of those around her. Secondly, a boiled egg in a dream means an educated girl, from a respectable family, with good lineage, education and culture. Thirdly, fried eggs, eyes, in a dream indicate a very beautiful girl. Interpretation of seeing eggs for a son Sirin: If a married man sees that he sees a hen laying a lot of eggs, then it is possible that his wife will lay the same number of eggs, but children. But if the husband sees that the hen is giving birth, this means that the woman will give birth to a son. God knows where he was born. If a man sees in his dream that he gave an egg to his son, But it broke, it means that the boy will die soon, and God knows best. But if a man sees his wife laying eggs, this means that God knows that the boy will be an ungrateful infidel. As for whoever sees eggs burned in one place, the scholars of interpretation have interpreted it as evidence of women being taken captive. The place, and God knows best. As for whoever sees himself eating eggshells, it means that he is a man robbing graves and wounding the dead. On the Shamloul website, we present to you a number of interpretations of how to see eggs in a dream, whether they are married, pregnant, or single, and in the end we say that God Almighty has

Secondly, a boiled egg in a dream means an educated girl, from a respectable family, with good lineage, education and culture. Thirdly, fried eggs, eyes, in a dream indicate a very beautiful girl. Interpretation of seeing eggs for a son Sirin: If a married man sees that he sees a hen laying a lot of eggs, then it is possible that his wife will lay the same number of eggs, but children. But if the husband sees that the hen is giving birth, this means that the woman will give birth to a son. God knows where he was born. If a man sees in his dream that he gave an egg to his son, But it broke, it means that the boy will die soon, and God knows best. But if a man sees his wife laying eggs, this means that God knows that the boy will be an ungrateful infidel. As for whoever sees eggs burned in one place, the scholars of interpretation have interpreted it as evidence of women being taken captive. The place, and God knows best. As for whoever sees himself eating eggshells, it means that he is a man robbing graves and wounding the dead. On the Shamloul website, we present to you a number of interpretations of how to see eggs in a dream, whether they are married, pregnant, or single, and in the end we say that God Almighty has

title: Interpretation of hitting a husband in a dream and a woman’s dream of hitting her husband

His treachery and arrogance, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a husband: Seeing a woman hitting her husband in a dream means that she will pay his debts or provide him with financial assistance. If a woman sees that she is beating her husband severely in a dream, this means that she will benefit from her advice or advice, and that a woman hitting her husband severely with blood in a dream indicates For her harshness in advising him. If he asks A wife from an unknown person hitting her husband in a dream indicates her need to help others. Interpretation of a dream about a wife hitting her husband because of betrayal. A wife who beats her husband for cheating on her with a woman she knows in a dream shows helping him in a partnership or business. If a married woman sees that she is beating her husband for cheating on her with a friend. The dream, this indicates his help in getting out of distress. For a woman to kill her husband because he cheats on her in front of her in a dream means losing money, and whoever sees that she killed her husband after seeing him having intercourse with another woman in a dream, this indicates his loss of his position. And losing his job. Interpretation of seeing marital infidelity in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a woman hitting her husband with a stick. Seeing a woman hitting her husband with a stick in a dream means that she will support and support her in difficult circumstances. title: Interpretation of dreams about breaking the hymen of an unmarried woman and bleeding

preview.html: Through this topic, we will learn about the comprehensive interpretation of seeing losing one’s virginity in a dream, so stay with us to learn about the interpretation of a dream about a person’s virginity being broken by someone you know and its interpretation of a dream about virginity blood. For singles, as well as the interpretation of a dream about not breaking one’s virginity for singles from the Mofser website and learn more. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman’s hymen breaking and shedding blood in an unmarried girl’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about breaking an unmarried woman’s hymen and bleeding in a dream is a dream worthy of praise, especially for an unmarried girl. And so on. The dream indicates the happiness that awaits her in the future and her joy that her dreams will come true soon. Seeing the loss of virginity in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a positive change that will occur in her life in the coming period. Breaking her virginity also symbolizes engagement and marriage, and if she sees a man breaking her virginity in a dream, she may He marries her, and God knows best. The dream of breaking the hymen and bleeding in the dream are dreams that express hearing good news in the near future. If the dreamer is getting married and sees this dream, then these are natural fears, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of the dream of breaking the virginity and bleeding in the dream. Interpretation of seeing the breaking of the virginity of a single woman and bleeding in the A dream for a married woman: Interpretation of dreams about breaking the hymen for a married woman, and bleeding dreams portend many positive things. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband represents her virginity, it is a sign of love and understanding between them. If a married woman dreams that her husband is trying to break her virginity, then she will be ashamed. It is an indication of her husband’s abundant livelihood. And increase the good in her home, and gain a lot of money in the coming period, God willing. When a married woman sees in her dream a stranger depriving her of her virginity, whether he is a relative or a stranger. It is an unwelcome sign and expresses the observer being exposed to humiliation and sadness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a membrane A woman’s virginity is broken and blood is shed in a dream about a man and its meaning. Ibn Sirin says when he sees a man in his sleep as if he is cleaning a girl’s virginity in a dream. It is a sign that the fortuneteller is a healthy person with a strong personality that makes him able to overcome difficulties and solve his problems wisely. As for Sheikh Al-Nabulsi’s opinion on the interpretation of the vision The Virgin Mary in a dream. It is an indication of the profits and financial gains that he will obtain from his trade and he may inherit a large sum, and God knows best. If a man sees in his dream that he entered his wife again and broke her virginity, then this is a dream. It heralds happiness and renewed love between him and his wife and that their life is full of friendship. And understanding and stability. Read also: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person. Meaning of seeing a single woman’s hymen breaking and bleeding in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s hymen tearing and bleeding. It is one of the dreams that indicate the approaching birth, which will be easy and smooth, God willing. And if the dreamer is in The first months of pregnancy, the dream reassures her that the good period of pregnancy will pass, and God knows best. Seeing loss of virginity in a pregnant woman’s dream expresses that the doors of livelihood will soon open for her and her husband, and that blessings will come to her home and be renewed.

title: Interpretation of the dream of eating pomegranates by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of eating pomegranates by Ibn Sirin in detail: Life is full of dreams, and because dreaming is a human condition that we cannot escape from, therefore the mind and subconscious have a great ally and form of manifestation in the dream, as pomegranates are a delicious and useful fruit and the fruit of the pomegranate. It can be made into juice, jam, or dried fruit, but seeing pomegranates in a dream has many connotations and meanings developed by commentators and senior sheikhs of Islam, and through this article via My Look magazine, we present to you all the clues and ideas. ConceptsInterpretation of a dream about eating pomegranates.Interpretation of a dream about eating pomegranates by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says about the interpretation of a dream about pomegranates that picking a pomegranate with the red seed means that the dreamer will get a lot of money, but picking a pomegranate with the white seed indicates that the dreamer will get coins, and from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation Syrine for eating a pomegranate in a dream is as follows: If a sick person eats a pomegranate in a dream, this dark color indicates his recovery from the disease, God willing. If a person sees that he has finished eating a pomegranate with white seeds, then the dream indicates that he will obtain some money. While eating Pomegranate with red seeds indicates a lot of profit and a lot of money. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating a pomegranate, this dream indicates happy events that will happen to her in the coming days. Seeing a broken pomegranate indicates a broken girl, divorced or widowed. If If a woman saw a rotten pomegranate in a dream, then this dream is interpreted as an obscene woman. The interpretation of a dream in which you see yourself eating a pomegranate indicates that you will earn money easily. To see yourself selling pomegranates in a dream means that you are wasting your energy on trivial matters. A dream indicates that you are eating Pomegranates in a dream indicate that you enjoy worldly affairs. Interpretation of a dream that you are eating pomegranates and squeezing pomegranate juice and drinking it in a dream indicates that you will spend money on your needs or for your family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving a dress in a dream to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of eating pomegranates in a dream for a pregnant woman. A woman is considered A pregnant woman is one of the most worrying things about dreams, due to her extreme fear for her safety and the safety of her fetus. In this paragraph, we present to you all the evidence and meanings of eating pomegranates in a dream for a pregnant woman. Women: A dream about eating pomegranates in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she enjoys good health, especially eating a sweet-tasting pomegranate. Eating pomegranates in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the birth of a healthy child, a good personality, and a beautiful face. If a pregnant woman dreams that she opens a pomegranate with difficulty This dream indicates that she will obtain money after hardships. It may indicate the birth of a child after suffering and difficulties in pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of seeing breasts in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a dream about eating pomegranates for a divorced woman. A divorced woman’s dream about eating pomegranates is considered a praiseworthy dream, and most interpreters agreed. However, the vision is good for divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about eating pomegranates for divorced women: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is eating a pomegranate, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about the dead asking for bread from the living

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for bread from a living person is one of the visions that many people experience, and it is a vision that causes anxiety for its owner, because a dream about dead people can be what worries many people. . Just as it was reported that a dead person takes something from a living person in a dream, this has many connotations, and many dream interpretation scholars have narrated many opinions about seeing a dead person taking bread, especially from a living person in a dream, and through our article we will learn about all these indicators through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about the dead asking for bread from the living: There are many different interpretations that arose when we see the dead taking bread from the living, which were narrated by a large group of dream interpretation scholars, including the famous scholar Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and dream interpretation scholars, and one of the most famous interpretations that appeared to see The dead taking bread from the living in a dream are as follows: First: Interpretation of the dead asking for bread in a dream: If one sees that the dead asks him for some bread, or a goose asks him for bread to eat, and the dreamer gives the dead bread in the dream and the dead takes the bread, then this vision indicates However, this person needs some supplication or alms from the living, especially if this vision is of one of the fortuneteller’s deceased relatives, such as the mother or father, then the living should pray for the dead. In the event that the dead person himself asks for bread in the dream from the dreamer or from one of his relatives In a dream, this indicates a serious lack of good deeds of the deceased and the need for hunger from one of the relatives, in the event that the deceased appears to be taking bread from one of the other people. In a dream, he needs an invitation from all his relatives. Second: Interpretation of a living person giving bread to a dead person: In the event that a living person sees himself offering bread to a dead person in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer always remembers that dead person and that he always offers To him alms or supplications. Seeing someone giving bread to a dead person, this vision indicates that this person will face some problems in his next life, especially if the bread was good. Third: The dead person took spoiled bread from the living: But if someone sees that the dead person takes bread from him In the dream, the bread was spoiled and inedible, so this vision indicates that the dreamer will face some problems, but God Almighty will quickly save him from them. Seeing spoiled bread in a dream, as if the dead person was taking spoiled bread in a dream, this indicates some financial problems that he will suffer from. A person, which is evidence of poverty and loss of money. Seeing the dead taking spoiled bread in a dream, this vision indicates that there is some distress and distress that befalls the dreamer, but he will get rid of them with something he did not expect to happen. Fourth: Interpretation of the dead taking bread from the living and eating it: But if A person saw that a dead person takes bread from him and eats it directly, so this vision indicates kindness and sustenance, because eating bread in a dream on behalf of a dead person is a vision of bread for the dreamer. Seeing the deceased taking bread from a living person and giving him a piece of bread and eating bread together in a dream, this vision indicates that The visionary
